entry.title: Medium Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $30 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 30.00 - 90.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • MEDIUM XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $3. Coupon codes do not apply to this special price: Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form.
    • DISPLAY: The large Xerographicas looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 3-4 Inches 5-6 Inches

entry.title: Beautiful Seedling Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $25 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 75.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • SEEDLING XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $25. Coupon codes not applicable to this special offer. Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form. These are beautiful, symmetric plants that are sustainably grown by seed in Guatemala. Purchasing these plants helps support sustainable air plant farming practices.
    • DISPLAY: The Xerographica looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 1-2 Inches 2-4 Inches

entry.title: Gift Wrapping
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: terrarium
Price: 5.00

Add this listing to your cart and we will gift wrap your order.

Please note that some large or wholesale orders cannot be gift wrapped. However, we can gift wrap almost anything purchased on the retail side of our website, including: air plant variety packs, terrariums, containers, ceramic, driftwood, sea shells with air plants, mopani and grapewood arrangements. 

Don't Forget to add your personalized Gift Note in the "Notes to Air Plant City" during checkout. These will print out on the gift receipt.

entry.summary:

Type:
Price: 4.95

  • Glue for mounting your plants on various items such as driftwood, cork bark, plant frames, and metal

  • Waterproof and very strong

  • The tube will adhere up to 20-50 plants to almost any surface

  • .05 oz size

entry.title: Air Plant City Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: Hidden on Google Shopping
Price: 10.00 - 300.00 (6 variants)

Shopping for an air plant hobbyist and not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Air Plant City gift card. They will be thrilled!

Check your inbox after purchasing this gift card. A message will be emailed to the purchaser with a form to add the email of the recipient and a personalized gift card note.

entry.title: Air Plant & Bromeliad Fertilizer Packet - One Year Supply
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 4.75 - 23.75 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Directions
    1. Formula: 17-8-22
    2. One Year Supply of Air Plant (Bromeliad) Fertilizer
    3. Specially formulated for air plants
    4. Encourage blooms and reproduction through pups
    5. Instruction card included with every packet
    6. May be added to spray bottles for easy application
    7. About 1 Year's worth of fertilizer for the average air plant/tillandsia enthusiast. This packet will make at least 12 gallons of fertilizer mixture. We recommend fertilizing your plants once per month.
  • DIRECTIONS: Add 1/4 teaspoon to a gallon of water and soak your air plants in the diluted mixture for 20 to 40 minutes once per month. The package comes with instructions and a one year supply of fertilizer. This is a very small package of fertilizer that will easily last for 12 months. It only takes 1/4 teaspoon of fertilizer per gallon of water. This package will make 12 gallons or 12 months
